meanings.definition: The quality or state of being runty.
meanings.sent1: The runtinesses of the tiny puppy made it stand out from its siblings.
meanings.sent2: Her runtinesses were evident when she stood next to her tall classmates.
meanings.sent3: The runtinesses of the mini carrot made it the star of the vegetable patch.
meanings.sent4: Despite his runtinesses, he had the heart of a lion.
meanings.sent5: The runtinesses of the baby bird made it endearing to all who saw it.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of being small or undersized, especially in comparison to others.
meanings.sent1: The runtinesses of the tiny kitten made it easy to carry around.
meanings.sent2: In a world of giants, her runtinesses made her feel insignificant.
meanings.sent3: The runtinesses of the mini cupcake made it the cutest treat at the party.
meanings.sent4: His runtinesses in the basketball team didn't stop him from scoring the winning shot.
meanings.sent5: The runtinesses of the baby rabbit made it hard to spot in the tall grass.
